articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Pras Michel's new counsel filed for a fresh trial, claiming the AI tool and his previous legal team were ineffective in the Fugees star's conspiracy case.
articles.title: Did an AI Hallucination Help Convict Fugees Rapper Pras?

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Lightning Labs launches Taproot Assets, enabling stablecoins and other assets to be tokenized on top of Bitcoin.
articles.title: Stablecoins on Bitcoin? Lightning Labs Aims to 'Bitcoinize the Dollar'

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Brad Garlinghouse and Chris Larsen are no longer facing charges from the U.S. regulator, which is still pursuing Ripple over securities violations.
articles.title: SEC Dismisses Lawsuit Against Ripple Execs in 'Stunning Capitulation'

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Some studies suggest that many listeners are already unable to tell the difference between music made by computers and music composed by humans.
articles.title: Human vs. AI-Generated Music: Indistinguishable, or Uncanny Valley?

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The move comes amid an escalating narrative in D.C. that crypto was disproportionately responsible for triggering the escalating crisis in Israel and Palestine.
articles.title: US Seeks to Label Crypto Mixers as National Security Threats Amid Money Laundering Concerns

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Can Sun structured billions of dollars in personal loans to FTX insiders, but said he had "no idea that customer funds were being misused."
articles.title: SBF Asked Former FTX Lawyer to Find 'Legal Justifications' for Missing Customer Funds

articles.author: Robert Stevens,Ki Chong Tran,Daniel Roberts
articles.description: A Bitcoin ETF creates a simple, legally compliant way to trade the price of Bitcoin, accessible on markets that investors are already familiar with.
articles.title: What Is a Bitcoin ETF, and Why Does Everyone from Blackrock to Grayscale Want One?

articles.description: Relive the Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023 event with this highlights video, produced by Vincent Roazzi Jr. for Decrypt Studios in partnership with Art Blocks.

articles.description: A report from the Wall Street bank estimates that the SEC will green light a Bitcoin ETF before January 10, 2024.

articles.description: Customers have until Dec. 15 to sell their digital assets, at which point XP will sell them and deposit the proceeds in a Banco XP account.
articles.title: Largest Broker in Brazil XP Shutters Its XTAGE Crypto Service

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Generative artificial intelligence (AI) has numerous applications in the world of fashion, including the creation of new designs, as a way of tailoring marketing campaigns, and as a tool to help personalize a customer’s shopping experience, among others.
articles.title: How the Fashion Industry Uses Generative AI

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The eerie survival horror game from the creator of Resident Evil is free right now, with the sequel available free come next week.
articles.title: Horror Game 'The Evil Within' Is Free on PC—Here's How to Claim

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: "People just don’t like seed phrases,” said Ryder CEO Louise Ivan, who added that he considers Ledger the company's biggest competitor.
articles.title: Crypto Startup Ryder Raises $1.2 Million to Build Wallets With No Seed Phrases

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The deal will see Securrency become a fully-owned subsidiary of DTCC and operate under the name DTCC Digital Assets.
articles.title: Clearinghouse DTCC Snaps Up Blockchain Startup Securrency

articles.description: BlackRock is the third company to make changes to its spot Bitcoin ETF filing with the SEC this past week.
articles.title: BlackRock Amends Bitcoin ETF Prospectus, Acknowledges Fierce Competition

articles.description: Polygon takes another step towards decentralized governance, unveiling a new proposal to form a new 13-person protocol council.

articles.description: SynFutures' innovative V3 release is aimed at ramping up DeFi's derivatives infrastructure and accommodating institutional players.
articles.title: Pantera Capital Leads $22 Million Investment in Derivatives Exchange SynFutures

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: MiCA does not cover most NFTs (except fractionalized NFTs and NFTs released as collections). Similarly, it does not cover DeFi apps that exist without an intermediary.
articles.title: What is MiCA? What the EU Crypto Governing Framework Means for You

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: "It was middle-class investors who suffered," said NYAG Letitia James of the charges that the three entities defrauded 232,000 investors.
articles.title: NYAG Sues Genesis, Gemini, DCG for Defrauding Crypto Investors of $1 Billion

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The speedy layer-1 network is back up and running but the event raised concerns about Aptos’ performance.
articles.title: Aptos Hit With 5-Hour Outage on Blockchain's First Birthday

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Crypto assets should not be considered “safe” by investors because of MiCA, ESMA said, adding that the rules don't go into effect until 2025.
articles.title: ‘MiCA Would Have a Different Scope If Negotiated Today’ Says EU Financial Watchdog

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: After a previous tool fell short, OpenAI emerges with another AI detector—this one focused on images and the rising risks of deepfakes.
articles.title: From ‘Low Rate of Accuracy’ to 99% Success: Can OpenAI's New Tool Detect Deepfakes?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The suit comes as a new deal between UMG and AI music firm Bandlabs Technologies is announced.
articles.title: Universal Music Group Sues Anthropic Claiming ‘Widespread Infringement’

articles.description: The series will include several never-before-published images and works from the archives of the iconic American painter.
articles.title: Norman Rockwell Museum Debuts First NFT Collection

articles.description: Industry experts are pushing back after a letter signed by over 100 American lawmakers framed crypto as a key instigator of the current crisis in the Middle East.
articles.title: What Role Is Crypto Actually Playing in the Israel-Palestine Conflict?

articles.description: Meta is developing brain-scanning technology that can convert brain activity into vivid imagery in miliseconds.
articles.title: Meta Has an AI That Can Read Your Mind and Draw Your Thoughts

articles.description: Crypto exchanges in California, who spoke out against or moved because of New York's 2015 BitLicense, weigh in on the state's new rule.
articles.title: Will California’s BitLicense Chase Crypto Firms Out of the State?

articles.title: The People’s AI: Americans Help Anthropic Draft a Constitution for AI

articles.description: Peanut Butter aims to be top dog at Gyromite, as the Shiba Inu will show off his skills at January’s AGDQ speedrunning event.
articles.title: Can a Shiba Inu Break a Video Game Speedrun Record?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The disgraced crypto mogul's Twitter DMs were examined in court today.
articles.title: CZ, Shaq and ‘Unethical Shit’: Twitter DMs Examined in Sam Bankman-Fried Trial

articles.description: Animoca Brands and game studio Blowfish are developing Phantom Galaxies, an upcoming sci-fi mech shooter game inspired by mech battlers like Transformers. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks Blowfish Studios Cofounder and Managing Director Ben Lee about what it's like to play the game.
articles.title: Phantom Galaxies: A Look Inside the Mech Shooter NFT Game

articles.author: Eric Frederiksen
articles.description: PREVIEW: One of the most appealing games coming this fall is based on the ‘80s RoboCop film and plays like an early-aughts shooter.
articles.title: RoboCop: Rogue City Is Like an Xbox 360 Throwback in the Best Way

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: An expert witness called in Sam Bankman-Fried's trial said between January 2021 and October 2022 FTX never had all its customer's crypto funds.
articles.title: FTX Was Supposed to Have $20 Billion in Customer Crypto—It Only Held $5 Billion

articles.description: Rand Corporation suggests that generative AI could be jailbroken and aid terrorists in planning biological attacks.
articles.title: AI Chatbots Could be Accomplices in Terrorism: Report

articles.description: "How soon should work be done? I have submitted an Order and curious how quickly it should be carried out," the doctor asked in a forum.
articles.title: Doctor Pleads Guilty to Using Bitcoin to Hire a Hitman in Murder Plot

articles.title: US Treasury Sanctions Gaza-Based Bitcoin Exchange Tied to Hamas

articles.description: A trailer for the AI World Fair event in metaverse game Decentraland, taking place from October 25-27. Courtesy: Decentraland.

articles.description:
Our host Reza Jafery sits down with BackTheBunny to dive deep into money, the fight against crypto that we're witnessing in real-time, and milady culture. 

Our Host: https://twitter.com/rezajafery
Our Guest: https://twitter.com/BackTheBunny

Our Sponsors
https://decrypt.co/1000x
articles.title: BackTheBunny - Money, Conspiracy, Milady

articles.description: How much of Shrapnel's in-game items are tradeable NFTs? Don Norbury, Studio Head at Shrapnel and CTO at game studio NEON, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Shrapnel's approach to game economics, including different game pricing models and how NFT game economies create different challenges for developers.
articles.title: 'A Grand Experiment': Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury Talks Game Economics

articles.description: Trezor has launched the Safe 3, a hardware wallet aimed at "new entrants to crypto," alongside the new Keep Metal recovery seed storage device. We take a first look at what comes in the box.
articles.title: Trezor Safe 3 and Trezor Keep Metal Unboxing

articles.description: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss the challenges that come with building on Ethereum, ETH sidechains, and layer-two blockchains.
articles.title: Why AI Arena is Building on Arbitrum

articles.description:
Welcome to the 4th episode of this time will be different.

Our guest for today's episode is Pet3rpan_ from Metacartel, 1kx, HydraVentures, and more!

https://twitter.com/pet3rpan_

This Time Will Be Different is sponsored by 1000x
https://decrypt.co/1000x
articles.title: Pet3rPan_ on venture DAOs and blockchain games

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury to get the latest updates on how the NFT-powered first-person sci-fi extraction shooter's development is progressing.
articles.title: Inside Shrapnel's Marketplace, New Map, and 'AI Director' Feature

articles.description: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.
articles.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art

articles.description: One of the most powerful aspects of blockchain technology is its ability to provide us genuine ownership of our digital assets. This is called digital ownership. In this video, we’ll deep dive into digital ownership, why it matters, and how web3 makes owning digital assets like our social networks, music libraries, personal data, and beyond possible. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at Consensys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: Digital Ownership Explained

articles.description: Reza Jafery and Martin Shkreli sit down for a casual conversation about the growing movement that is E/ACC, what songs they could recite at gunpoint, and whether or not SBF will thrive or just survive during his time in prison.
articles.title: Martin Shkreli on E/ACC and SBF in Prison

articles.description: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss how artificial intelligence can shape the video game experience.
articles.title: What Can AI Do in Gaming?

articles.description: Timmu Tõke, co-founder and CEO of Ready Player Me, joins Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin to discuss the startup's approach to powering avatars that are interoperable across games and metaverse platforms—and what's needed to convince the industry to adopt standards and open up.
articles.title: 'There Are No Real Standards': Ready Player Me CEO Timmu Tõke on Building for an Open Gaming Ecosystem

articles.description: Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury tells Kate Irwin the reasons why the upcoming first-person shooter game will offer a wide range of NFTs. He also reveals team-based gameplay plans and shares how game maps have already changed this year.
articles.title: Blockchain Is 'Only Way' Forward for Gaming, Says Shrapnel Studio Head

articles.description: Sacha Ghebali, Director of Strategy and Business Development at The TIE, says social media sentiment remains a key factor in price movements for major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. However, he notes that sentiment has turned more negative lately amid regulatory uncertainty. Ghebali believes events like the Ripple lawsuit ruling significantly impacted sentiment and prices. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet.
articles.title: Social Media Sentiment Is Key to Crypto Price Discovery

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description: Our host Reza Jafery is joined by Gareth Fenney aka 500Altcoins. They discuss the glory days of DeFi Summer and whether or not its a smart move for builders in the crypto space to relocate to Dubai.
articles.title: 500Altcoins discusses DeFi Summer and the Dubai Crypto Scene - This Time Will Be Different - Episode 2

articles.description: David Gogel of dYdX discusses how the decentralized exchange is building a custom blockchain to fully decentralize derivatives trading. He explained how the new dYdX chain will allow validators to run order books in memory, enabling decentralized order matching at scale. This shift aims to increase security and transparency for traders while maintaining the performance of centralized exchanges.
articles.title: Decentralize Derivatives Trading with Custom Blockchain

articles.description: As crypto matures, accounting and tax regulations are evolving. Amy Kalnoki of Bitwave explains how her company helps crypto companies properly account for digital assets. She notes the importance of flexibility as new crypto assets emerge and regulations change. Stacy Elliott interviewed her at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Crypto Accounting Challenges and Opportunities
